extension.summary: Universal Progress Tracker - Track your progress across all addons
extension.description: Automatically tracks playback progress for all videos in Kodi. Creates shortcuts for easy resume from Continue Watching menu. Works with any addon - no modifications needed!
extension.news: v1.0.0 (2026-01-03) - Initial release - Automatic playback tracking - Continue Watching menu with resume - Clean poster-based interface - Configurable settings with instant apply
